entries:
Saat menggunakan fungsi ini, hal-hal berikut ini harap diingat.

Talk

・Bagian dari fungsi ini mungkin tidak tersedia, tergantung pada versi OS ponsel.

・Dengan Chat, kamu bisa chatting dengan teman-teman di game atau memakai stiker.

・Saat bagian dari fitur Chat sedang dalam perbaikan, fitur Chat mungkin sementara tidak tersedia.

・Harap tidak menulis pesan atau mengirim gambar yang mungkin melanggar hak peserta lain (pernyataan menyinggung atau mengganggu, pelanggaran privasi, membocorkan informasi pribadi, apa pun yang dapat mengompromikan hak kekayaan intelektual, dsb.).

・Brave Frontier dan afiliasinya tidak akan bertanggung jawab atas konten terkait percakapan chat.

Silakan baca "Lobi - Chat & Komunitas Game - Ketentuan Layanan (Sebelumnya dikenal sebagai Ketentuan Layanan Nakamap)"kapan saja jika ada pertanyaan atau kekhawatiran lebih lanjut.

Jika ingin menghubungi kami mengenai khusus fitur Talk, silakan mengirimkan email ke

info@lobi.co

entries.REC_AGREEMENT_TEXT:
When using this function, please keep the following things in mind.

Recording Battles

・Sound will still play while recording, even when your phone is set on silent. Please bear this in mind.

・Recording will begin immediately after a battle starts. Once the battle is over, you can turn off the recording option when you please.

・Only the most recent video will be saved. If you record another video before uploading (submitting) the video you have currently stored, it will be overridden.

・Your videos will be stored in a server limited to 100MB of memory. If you exceed this capacity, your recording function will be automatically turned off.

・If you receive a call during one of your recordings, recording will automatically be cancelled. Also, when you reopen the application you will find that the interrupted recording has not been stored.

・Please be aware that since recording uses up part of the server's memory, the speed of your game could be affected.

Uploading Videos (Submissions)

・Uploading a video requires a considerable amount of bandwidth, so it make take quite some time to complete. It is recommended that you use a more stable internet source when you do this, such as Wi-Fi.

・Using 3G/4G/LTE to upload video requires a considerable amount of bandwidth, which may be restricted by some phone carriers. Please also keep in mind that the high use of packets while uploading video can also lead to extra fees depending on your carrier and phone plan. These fees are solely the responsibility of the application user.
(For more specific information concerning extra fees and bandwidth limitation, please consult your personal phone carrier.)

・Since recording will be operating in the background, please keep in mind that the considerable amount of memory it requires from the server may have an effect on the speed of the game.

・Interruptions while uploading, or failure to upload may also occur.


In addition, feel free to review the "Lobi - Chat & Game Community - Terms of Use (Formerly known as the Nakamap Terms of Use)"at any time if you have any further questions or concerns.

entries.TALK_AGREEMENT_TEXT:
Please keep the following conditions in mind when using this function.

Talk

・Parts of this function may not be available depending on your phone's OS version.

・Using Talk, you can chat with your friends in the game by inputting text or using stamps.

・When a part of the Talk feature is under maintenance, the Talk feature may become temporarily unavailable.

・Please refrain from inputting any text or images that may infringe on any participant's rights (offensive and intrusive statements, infringement on privacy, leaking of any personal information, anything that may compromise intellectual property, etc.).

・Brave Frontier and its affiliates will not be held responsible for the contents pertaining to any chat conversation.

In addition, feel free to review the "Lobi - Chat & Game Community - Terms of Use (Formerly known as the Nakamap Terms of Use)"at any time if you have any further questions or concerns.

If you would like to contact us concerning the Talk feature in particular, please feel free to do so via email.

info@lobi.co

entries.TUTORIAL_SKIP_TEXT: Do you wish to skip the tutorial?
entries.TUT_EQUIP_SPH_DESC_PG1:
- Equipping spheres to units give them an advantageous boost in battle.
- Different spheres offer different effects and boost, which helps you optimize your units and make them more effective in battle.
entries.TUT_EQUIP_SPH_DESC_PG2:
- Spheres can be crafted within the sphere house in the village.
- Unique spheres with special abilities can also be obtained from ranking up in the arena and also participating in competitive events earning them as rewards!
entries.TUT_EVOLVE_DESC_PG1:
- Upon reaching max level, units can be evolved to a higher rarity level with stronger potential.
- Evolution require evolution units and Zel.
entries.TUT_EVOLVE_DESC_PG2: - Capture evolution units from Weekly dungeons appearing in the Vortex.
entries.TUT_FUSION_DESC_PG1:
- Units gain HP, Atk, Def & Rec upon leveling up.
- Units gain EXP by sacrificing other units to them, so choose carefully.
entries.TUT_FUSION_DESC_PG2:
- Metal Units give more EXP compared to normal units.
- Metal Units with the same element as the base fusion unit will give more EXP
entries.TUT_FUSION_DESC_PG3:
- Capture Metal units by unlocking Metal Parade in the Vortex.
- Collect your Metal Parade keys from Administration Office within Imperial Capital Randall regularly.
entries.TUT_ITEMS_DESC_PG1:
- Equip items you have synthesized to use in battle by tapping on “Manage Items”.
- You can bring a maximum of 5 different items to battle.
entries.TUT_MANAGE_SQ_DESC_PG1:
- Tap on Empty Slot to equip unit.
- Tap on equipped unit to swap.
- You can preset 10 squads, swipe left or right to change squads
entries.TUT_MANAGE_SQ_DESC_PG2:
- Each squad can equip 5 units
- Each unit has a cost, the more powerful, the higher the cost
- Level up your player level to increase your squad cost capacity
entries.TUT_MANAGE_SQ_DESC_PG3: - Tap “Change Leader” and assign any units currently equipped in squad as leader by tapping on it.
entries.TUT_MANAGE_SQ_DESC_PG4:
- Tap “Change Position” and DRAG your equipped units to swap positions with each other.

Hint: This helps you optimize your use of units with different speeds during battle to create more simultaneous hit chances thus producing sparks.
entries.TUT_SPH_DESC_PG1:
- Spheres can be crafted with sufficient materials collected through harvesting and questing.
- Spheres can be equipped to units boosting their abilities.
entries.TUT_SPH_DESC_PG2:
- Rare materials are needed to synthesize more powerful items/spheres.
- They can be harvested from high level resource fields.
- And by challenging the “Hostile Relics” Vortex Event every Friday.
entries.TUT_SYN_DESC_PG1:
- Items can be synthesized with sufficient materials collected through quests or harvesting.
- Upgrade Synthesis in the Upgrade Facility to be able to synthesize more powerful items.
entries.TUT_SYN_DESC_PG2:
- Rare materials are needed to synthesize more powerful items/spheres.
- They can be harvested from high level resource fields.
- And by challenging the “Hostile Relics” Vortex Event every Friday.
entries.TUT_UPGRADES_DESC_PG1:
- Upgrading facilities require Karma.
- HOLD the “Allot Karma” button to upgrade a selected facility or resource field.
- Facilities and resource fields are able to produce higher level materials and items when upgraded.
entries.TUT_UPGRADES_DESC_PG2:
- Karma can be obtained through harvesting resource fields,
- From enemies during battles when questing.
- More can be obtained through every Monday’s Vortex event “Congregation of Souls”
entries.TUT_UPGRADES_DESC_PG3:
- Glimmering resource fields are ready for harvesting. Tap on the fields to harvest materials, karma & zel.
- Rarer materials can be harvested with higher level upgraded fields to create powerful items or spheres.
